members.joinCircumstances: Lucci is the de facto leader and strongest member of CP9.
Kaku is a CP9 agent who was undercover as a shipwright at Galley-La Company.
Kalifa is a CP9 agent who was undercover as Iceburg's secretary.
Blueno is a CP9 agent who was undercover as a bar owner in Water 7.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Identities Revealed to Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The true identities of Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno as CP9 agents are revealed to the Straw Hats and Paulie, exposing their five-year undercover mission in Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: This is the first time CP9 is formally introduced as an organization in the anime. Establishes them as the primary antagonists of the Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs.

keyMoments.title: First Direct Combat with Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: CP9 agents engage in combat with the Straw Hat Pirates, demonstrating their superior Rokushiki techniques and preventing the crew from reaching Robin.
keyMoments.significance: First direct confrontation establishes the power dynamic and shows the Straw Hats need to grow stronger to defeat CP9.

keyMoments.title: Rokushiki Techniques Introduced
keyMoments.description: CP9 agents demonstrate their mastery of Rokushiki, the Six Powers martial arts, including techniques like Shigan and Kami-e.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the Rokushiki system that defines CP9's fighting style and establishes them as elite World Government operatives.

jollyRoger.description: CP9 does not use a Jolly Roger as they are a World Government organization, not a pirate crew.
